ComicInfo.Title: The Gathering, Part 1 of 5: Sysyphyx
ComicInfo.Summary: The Gathering, Part 1 of 5: Sysyphyx: Five men are on an arctic expedition for Mr. Arkham, searching for a ship. Their equipment fails and they want to stop the expedition but Mr. Arkham employee Connor insists they continue. They find the ship containing a trunk. Connor tells them that no one is to open the trunk. Three months later Connor is in a bar telling a girl the story and he says he is the only one who made it back alive. She goes back to his boarding house and when she opens the trunk Sysyphyx pops out and kills her, taking over her body. Nyarlathotep then tells her they need to prepare for the other arrivals.
